snippet: The results of a closely watched survey underline the view that the world’s second-largest economy has settled into a mild rebound that is likely to extend into 2013.
lead_paragraph: The results of a closely watched survey underline the view that the world’s second-largest economy has settled into a mild rebound that is likely to extend into 2013.

headline.seo: Chinese Manufacturing Sector Expanded in December
headline.main: Chinese Manufacturing Sector Expands for a 3rd Month
